d1_text:
Npc0109:
ï¿½I can't believe I saw it with my own eyes.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I was staring out the window and there it was, just fluttering there...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I'd only seen it in the encyclopedia before.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½What was it?[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½A Magic butterfly![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If you get close to a Magic butterfly, all your cares fly away,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½just like a fluttering butterfly.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Yep, yep![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½That's the effect of the legendary Magic butterfly.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I love talking about it![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Ooops![WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Sorry about the outburst...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½I got carried away with all the talk about lovely butterflies...[HALT][END]
